name: entreprise-facile
tag_list: invoicing, accounting, expenses, cash-flow, sme, contractor, entrepreneur, saas
overview:
entreprise-facile is a web application that provides contractors and SME’s with a Virtual Office where they can better organize and plan their activity.

Entrepreneurs can edit bills, track their sales with the CRM module, track their expenses and their cash flows, and watch productivity and margin by project or for the whole company.

The Virtual Office is a collaborative application that allows founders to share information with employees: tasks, notes, events, file sharing, etc..

The Virtual Office is also mobile as the iPhone version allows users to login on the virtual space and see activity, add new tasks or notes, follow unpaid bills, etc.

Thus far the Virtual Office is only available in French.

milestones.description: Reached 100 million euros of invoicing on its invoicing plateform
milestones.source_description: entreprise-facile reached 100 million euros of invoicing on its invoicing plateform
